items.content_html: If Apple really is slowing down and fixing bugs, rather than adding features, I wish they would work more on Xcode 9, which is still a mess for me for Swift development.
I’m coding a user-requested feature this evening. I started really late after a 2-hour trip to Wegmans. I stayed up to do a particularly satisfying refactor.

I may be helping out my employer with podcasting in the next few months. It is surprising to me that they are interested in podcasting. For them, it’s about owning content, and about it being evergreen, rather than ephemeral, like webinars. It would be fun to help out with it.
🎙 It’s Monday morning, so I am listening to “This Week in Tech”.

I just pre-ordered Alto’s Odyssey even though I think preordering apps is stupid, because Alto’s Adventure is one of my all-time favorite iOS games, and I’ve been eagerly awaiting its sequel for a long time.
I don’t watch the Winter Olympics. It is not for me. Enjoy it, everybody else!
My wife, daughter, and I enjoyed the Purim-related children’s activities at the temple this morning.
I’m thinking about writing a series of blog posts about how I, somewhat accidentally, went from “normal person” to “audiophile” over the past 20 years. 🙋🏼‍♂️❤️ 🎧 & 🔈
Looking forward to seeing Roger’s & Hammerstein’s “Cinderella” soon. I hope my daughter enjoys it!

Blog post*: Strategies to increase diversity on Micro.blog

*(repost because this link didn’t appear on my micro blog, only in my timeline)
